text: Wilson Chisala Kalumba (c.28 February 1964 – 15 May 2018) was a Zambian politician who served as the mayor of Lusaka from 2016 until his death on 15 May 2018. ==References== Category:1960s births Category:Year of birth missing Category:2018 deaths Category:Mayors of Lusaka
title: Wilson Chisala Kalumba
